        Returns whether the specified string is a valid path.
        Parameters:
        path - a string.
        Returns:
        true if the specified string is a valid path, or otherwise false.

      • getFileName

        public static String getFileName(Path path)
        Returns the file name of the specified Path as a string. If the Path has zero elements, an empty string is returned.
        Parameters:
        path - a path.
        Returns:
        the file name of the specified Path as a string.

      • isAncestor

        public static boolean isAncestor(Path ancestor,
                                 Path child)
        Returns whether a Path is the ancestor of another Path.
        Parameters:
        ancestor - a potential ancestor Path.
        child - a potential child Path.
        Returns:
        true if the specified potential ancestor Path is an ancestor of the specified potential child Path, or otherwise false.

      • getCommonAncestor

        public static Path getCommonAncestor(Path path1,
                                     Path path2)
        Returns the closest common ancestor Path of two Paths.
        Parameters:
        path1 - a Path.
        path2 - another Path.
        Returns:
        the closest common ancestor Path of two Paths.

      • getCommonAncestor

        public static Path getCommonAncestor(Collection<Path> paths)
        Returns the closest common ancestor Path of a collection of Paths.
        Parameters:
        paths - a collection of Paths.
        Returns:
        the closest common ancestor Path of the specified Paths.

        Returns:
